Help

Getting Started

  • Type a message and press Enter to start a conversation
  • Click on a node to select it, then type to reply
  • Ctrl/Cmd + click to select multiple nodes
  • Drag the canvas to pan, scroll to zoom
  • Double-click empty space to fit all nodes in view

Keyboard Shortcuts

Ctrl/Cmd + K Search nodes
Ctrl/Cmd + Z Undo
Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + Z Redo
Delete / Backspace Delete selected nodes
R Focus reply input (when node selected)
C Copy node content (when node selected)
F Fit node to viewport (when node selected)
- Collapse children (when node selected)
= Expand children (when node selected)
Z Zoom to selection (when node(s) selected)
Shift + Z Zoom out to fit all content
‚Üë / ‚Üì or j / k Navigate to parent/child nodes
Escape Clear selection / Close dialogs
Enter Send message
Shift + Enter New line in message

Slash Commands

/note text or URL Create a note (supports PDF URLs)
/search query Search the web with Exa AI
/research topic Deep research with multiple sources
/matrix context Create a comparison matrix
/committee question Consult multiple LLMs and synthesize
/factcheck claims Verify claims with web search
/code Create Python code node (select CSV first)

Tips

  • Branching: Select text in a node to create a branch from that specific point
  • Semantic zoom: Zoom out to see node summaries instead of full content
  • Collapse nodes: Click the ‚àí button or press - to hide a node's children and reduce clutter
  • Context: The context budget bar shows how much of the model's context window is used
  • Tags: Use the üè∑Ô∏è button to organize nodes with colored tags
  • Stop generation: Click "‚èπ Stop" on an AI response to stop and optionally continue later
  • PDF import: Click üìé to upload a PDF, or drag & drop onto the canvas
